snippet: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray will face off in a second claycourt final within eight days at the Italian Open after the two in-form players proved on Saturday that they will be the ones to beat at the season's second grand slam in Roland Garros....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray will face off in a second claycourt final within eight days at the Italian Open after the two in-form players proved on Saturday that they will be the ones to beat at the season's second grand slam in Roland Garros.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Murray to Face Off in Another Final
headline.main: Djokovic and Murray to Face Off in Another Final
